comments.author: a581aa
comments.body: The biggest scam company, I finally saw you promoting your business on bitcointalk. I saw your platform on YouTube and played for two weeks, losing money every day during that time. In the end, I may have lost a total of $2,000 to you. On the last day, there was still $190 left in my account that I hadn't withdrawn. When I logged in again the next day, my balance was zero. I tried to recover my money in the Telegram community but received no response and was eventually kicked out by you from the Telegram community. The biggest scam company!

comments.author: rokuen
comments.body: Yes, they are proven scammers. They refund the winning bets, but the losing ones remain

Otherwise you may get a red tag soon as a spamming newbie.Additionally you said it by yourself Â that you suck and clearly lack of skill in sports betting may be the reason for your losses over the past two weeks i donâ€™t see how itâ€™s the casinoâ€™s fault if you keep losing your bets?On a positive note Dexsport seems like an exciting web3 casino concept not that i tried it yet but with a decentralized website and various options for sports betting using different cryptocurrencies i may try it for the coming UCL matches this month. However if Dexsport do not accept bitcoin i think they should o move this ANN thread to the altcoin section

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: I see a lot of red flags and personally, I would avoid this gambling platform, dexsport.io, like the plague. After performing a simple google search, I found that there are a lot of people accusing this platform of withholding funds and not paying out winnings (on social medias like Twitter and Reddit but even on their own Telegram community channel you will see people complaining about not being able to withdraw their money)... Even the title of this platform is incredibly dishonest by calling itself "the first decentralized crypto sports betting platform". It is obviously not decentralized nor the first of anything if the users cannot even hold on to their own funds and winnings can be randomly rejected by a centralized admin.If anyone has proof of scamming, they should definitely post it in the scam accusations subforum! I think there is a high possibility of them being either extremely incompetent and/or dishonest.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: They got busted so fast. This thread doesn't even last for a month before receiving scam accusations. This shows that we don't really cater scam and we want to help each other by giving warning to this forum. I suggest to victims to post a scam accusation with proofs in the Scam accusation board for it to be recognized as scam casinos. This is why I don't even try playing on new casino because the chance of you being scammed is so high. Be careful guys especially on new casinos.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Name: dexsport.ioPosts: 1Activity: 1Merit: 0Position: NewbieDate Registered: April 18, 2023, 04:46:28 PMLast Active: April 20, 2023, 11:43:21 PMOP hasn't been active since more than 10 days, I wonder: what kind of person who wants customers for his business would expose his business and then disappear? let's imagine the following: someone creates a store, then opens the store and places many items in the store window so that people can see the items that are sold in the store, but the next day that person does not open the store and disappears for many days , is it really that and a person would be? will those people who left far from their homes to go to the store and find the store closed go back to the store again? the answer is very obvious, people don't go back to that store, they go to look for serious storesnow we have to ask ourselves why OP disappeared? he just created this thread and disappeared, he created an account on April 18th, we might even think that he was opening the casino here on the forum, but in fact this casino already exists since November of last year and does not have a good reputation, we can see that here:Source: https://www.trustpilot.com/review/dexsport.iowe can see that they have had some problems in the past, this is another big red flag, I also suspect they don't have a license from curacao, and to add they don't ask for KYC and we all know that governments don't hesitate to go after sites without a license and that do not ask for KYC, they could put in their casino that they could ask for KYC in case of suspicious activity, but they put that they will not ask for KYC without a doubt that it is a dangerous path and that sooner or later the government will seize their casino, but also with these scam accusations, people better stay away from this casino
